job_tasks.phrase: funger als senior door zowel zelf te coderen als het team te coachen op technische aspecten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of coding and also coaching the team on technical aspects, aligning with traditional software development responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: De focus ligt op het ontwikkelen van end-to-end webapplicaties met behulp van Python en Django.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the development of web applications, a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Het schrijven van efficiënte, onderhoudsvriendelijke en schaalbare code voor verschillende applicaties van het platform behoren tot je takenpakket;
job_tasks.justification: This describes the essential software engineering practice of writing maintainable and scalable code for applications.

job_tasks.phrase: werk je nauw samen met data scientist en data engineers om LLM's te integreren zodat het platform optimaal functioneert en presteert;
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the integration of LLMs into a platform, which is a key aspect of integrating AI/ML features into software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: uitvoeren van code-reviews, het geven van constructieve feedback om onze 'coding standards' en 'best practices' te blijven hanteren;
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and adherence to coding standards are core software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Werk je nauw samen met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen, technische oplossingen te adviseren en hoogwaardige softwareproducten op tijd en binnen het budget te leveren.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software development lifecycle, including understanding stakeholder needs, advising on technical solutions, and delivering software products.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM en softwareontwikkeling zodat je instaat bent om met nieuwe inzichten en aanbevelingen te komen ter optimalisatie van onze producten;
job_tasks.justification: While this mentions GenAI and LLM, the focus is on staying informed and providing recommendations for product optimization, which leans more towards understanding and applying existing technologies rather than core model development or fine-tuning.

soft_skills.justification: Understanding stakeholder needs and advising on technical solutions to deliver products within budget aligns with business understanding and strategy.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional software development tasks (coding, web application development, code reviews, scalability, integration of LLMs) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions GenAI and LLMs, the core responsibility is integrating these into a platform and developing the platform itself, rather than focusing on the AI model development or specialization tasks (Macro-Category B). The role involves building and maintaining software that uses AI features, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a strong focus on software development and integration, with the mention of GenAI/LLMs being in the context of integration into a platform. The tasks are predominantly from Macro-Category A, with a clear mention of integrating LLMs. The profile assignment is well-supported by the text, though a slightly higher score could be achieved if there were more explicit details on the AI integration aspect beyond just 'integrating LLMs'.
